name: SmileanBid
short_description:
SmileanBid - the next generation of online auctions
Founded in the UK in 2011, SmileanBid is one of the world’s most innovative auction sites. Based on a widely used and familiar business model, the company sells premium products like: computers, cameras, game consoles and even cars, at very low prices. SmileanBid auctions over 3,000 products per month and has more than 10 thousand registered customers.
Here is how it works: our online customers buy “bids” in advance. They cost £0.50 each and are sold in packs of 20, 40, 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, 350, 500, 750, 1000 and 2000. Bidders have the choice of placing single bids, or, using an electronic bid assistant called the “Auto SmileanBid”.
Every bid placed, increases the price of the product by 1p and the auction countdown by up to 20 seconds.
summary: penny auctions, penny auctions uk, online bidding sites, bidding sites
